attributes.action: Conduct a Comprehensive and Independent review of the SDSR
attributes.additional_details: The Men and Women of HM Armed Forces deserve a proper strategic defense review rather then a hastily drawn up cost reduction exercise! The MoD needs to re-evaluate the nations defensive capabilities as a result of the SDSR (ie: 20,000 reduction in Regular Army an loss of all Aircraft Carriers until 2020) and re-assess whether the decisions made where for a legitimate defesive reason or merely a way of reducing government deficit.
